headline: 3 Industrials Stocks with Questionable Fundamentals
summary: Even if they go mostly unnoticed, industrial businesses are the backbone of our country. But their prominence also brings high exposure to the ups and downs of economic cycles. Luckily, the tide is turning in their favor as the industry’s 18.1% return over the past six months has topped the S&P 500 by 3.8 percentage points.
